org.bonitasoft.engine.api
Interface GroupAPI

All Known Subinterfaces:
IdentityAPI
public interface GroupAPI

Author:
Zhao Na, Bole Zhang, Matthieu Chaffotte, Hongwen Zang

Method Detail

createGroup

Group createGroup(String name,
                  String parentPath)
                  throws AlreadyExistsException,
                         CreationException
Creates a group from its name and parent path. If the group is a top level one, the parent path must be null.

Parameters:
name - the name of the group
parentPath - the parent path of the group (null means no parent)
Returns:
the created group
Throws:
AlreadyExistsException - If the couple name/parentPath is already taken by an existing group
CreationException - If an exception occurs during the group creation
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

createGroup

Group createGroup(GroupCreator creator)
                  throws AlreadyExistsException,
                         CreationException
Creates a group. It takes the values of the creator in order to create a group.

Parameters:
creator - the group creator
Returns:
the created group
Throws:
AlreadyExistsException - If the couple name/parentPath is already taken by an existing group
CreationException - If an exception occurs during group creation
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

updateGroup

Group updateGroup(long groupId,
                  GroupUpdater updater)
                  throws GroupNotFoundException,
                         UpdateException
Updates the group according to the updater values.

Parameters:
groupId - the identifier of the group
updater - the group updater
Returns:
the updated group
Throws:
GroupNotFoundException - If the group identifier does not refer to an existing group
UpdateException - If an exception occurs during the group update
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

deleteGroup

void deleteGroup(long groupId)
                 throws DeletionException
Deletes the group.

Parameters:
groupId - the identifier of the group
Throws:
DeletionException - If an exception occurs during the group deletion
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

deleteGroups

void deleteGroups(List<Long> groupIds)
                  throws DeletionException
Deletes the groups.

Parameters:
groupIds - the list of group identifiers
Throws:
DeletionException - If an exception occurs during the group deletion
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

getGroup

Group getGroup(long groupId)
               throws GroupNotFoundException
Retrieves the group.

Parameters:
groupId - the group identifier
Returns:
the group
Throws:
GroupNotFoundException - If the group identifier does not refer to an existing group
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the group retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

getGroupByPath

Group getGroupByPath(String groupPath)
                     throws GroupNotFoundException
Retrieves the group according to its full path.

Parameters:
groupPath - the full path of the group (parentPath/name)
Returns:
the group
Throws:
GroupNotFoundException - If the group path does not refer to an existing group
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the group retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

getNumberOfGroups

long getNumberOfGroups()
Returns the total number of groups.

Returns:
the total number of groups
Throws:
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the count retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

getGroups

List<Group> getGroups(int startIndex,
                      int maxResults,
                      GroupCriterion criterion)
Retrieves the paginated list of groups. It retrieves from the startIndex to the startIndex + maxResults.

Parameters:
startIndex - the start index
maxResults - the max number of groups
criterion - the sorting criterion
Returns:
the list of groups
Throws:
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the group retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

getGroups

Map<Long,Group> getGroups(List<Long> groupIds)
Retrieves the groups. The map contains the couples groupId/Group. If a group does not exists, no exception is thrown and no value is added in the map.

Parameters:
groupIds - the identifiers of the groups
Returns:
the groups
Throws:
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the group retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

searchGroups

SearchResult<Group> searchGroups(SearchOptions options)
                                 throws SearchException
Searches groups according to the criteria containing in the options.

Parameters:
options - the search criteria
Returns:
the search result
Throws:
SearchException - If an exception occurs during the group searching
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0
